title: Lemon Glazed Gingerbread Cake
ingredients: ['200g self raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 egg', '100g caster sugar', '125ml vegetable oil', '175g treacle', '125ml boiling water', 'Lemon glaze', '85g icing sugar', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice']
